summary: A middle-aged disabled man unknowingly begins a lonely hearts correspondence with his own unmarried sister, who takes care of him. As he writes more and more to her, he begins to fall in ... See full summary »
cast: Simone Signoret|Jean Rochefort|Delphine Seyrig|Geneviève Fontanel|Dominique Labourier|Gilette Barbier|Marion Loran|Jean Obé|Madeleine Ozeray|Danielle Altenburger|Claudine Delvaux|Pierre Gallon|Florence Haziot|Marius Laurey|Anne-Marie Matignon|Albert Merour|Malène Sveinbjornsson|Eric Le Roy|Antoine Roblot
title: Chère inconnue
